languages.text: Энергетический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} обычно наносят различные химические вещества, огонь, электричество и энергетические лучи. Эта группа включает: -Огненный: все, что поджигает цель. -Электрический: все, что поражает цель электрическим током. -Токсичный: все, что наносит урон ядом, едкой кислотой и прочим. -Термический: все энергетическое и плазменное оружие.

Energy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by various chemical substances, fire, electricity and energy beams. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Fire: anything that ignites the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Shock: anything that electrocutes the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>
languages.original_text: Энергетический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} обычно наносят различные химические вещества, огонь, электричество и энергетические лучи. Эта группа включает: -Огненный: все, что поджигает цель. -Электрический: все, что поражает цель электрическим током. -Токсичный: все, что наносит урон ядом, едкой кислотой и прочим. -Термический: все энергетическое и плазменное оружие.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Energieschaden{/g} wird normalerweise durch verschiedene chemische Substanzen, Feuer, Elektrizität und Energiestrahlen verursacht. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>Feuer: Alles, was das Ziel in Brand setzt.</indent>
<indent=5%>Schock: Alles, was dem Ziel einen Stromschlag versetzt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gift: Alles, was Schaden durch Gift, ätzende Säure usw. verursacht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: Alles, was Energiestrahlen oder Plasma einsetzt oder das Ziel auflöst.</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Energieschaden {/g} wird normalerweise durch verschiedene chemische Substanzen, Feuer, Elektrizität und Energiestrahlen verursacht. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>Feuer: Ales, was das Ziel in Brand setzt</indent>
<indent=5%>Schock: Alles, was dem Ziel einen Stromschlag versetzt</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gift: Alles, was Schaden durch Gift, ätzende Säure usw. verursacht</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: Alles, was Energiestrahlen oder Plasma einsetzt oder das Ziel auflöst</indent>

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'énergie sont généralement infligés par des substances chimiques, des flammes, de l'électricité et des faisceaux d'énergie. Leurs différents types sont les suivants :
-<indent=5%>Dégâts de feu : tout ce qui enflamme la cible.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts d'électrocution : tout ce qui électrocute la cible.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts toxiques : tout ce qui inflige des dégâts par le biais de poison, d'acide corrosif, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts thermiques : tout ce qui utilise des faisceaux d'énergie, du plasma ou qui désintègre la cible.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Energy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by various chemical substances, fire, electricity and energy beams. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Fire: anything that ignites the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Shock: anything that electrocutes the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les dégâts d'énergie{/g} sont généralement infligés par des substances chimiques ainsi que par le feu, l'électricité et les faisceaux d'énergie. Leurs différents types sont les suivants :
-<indent=5%>Dégâts de feu : tout ce qui enflamme la cible</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts d'électrocution : tout ce qui électrocute la cible</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts toxiques : tout ce qui inflige des dégâts par le biais de poison, d'acide corrosif, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts thermiques : tout ce qui utilise des faisceaux d'énergie, du plasma ou qui désintègre la cible</indent>

languages.text:
能量{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}通常由火焰、电流、能量束，以及各种化学物质造成。能量伤害类型包括：
- <indent=5%>火焰：目标遭到点燃时承受的伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>电击：目标遭到电击时承受的伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>毒素：目标遭到毒素或腐蚀性酸液影响时承受的伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>热能：目标被能量束、等离子体或其他瓦解性能量影响时承受的伤害。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Energy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by various chemical substances, fire, electricity and energy beams. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Fire: anything that ignites the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Shock: anything that electrocutes the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>

languages.original_text: Energy damage is usually dealt by various chemical substances, fire, electricity and energy beams. Its types are: -{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire{/g}: anything that ignites the target. -{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Shock{/g}: anything that electrocutes the target. -{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Toxic{/g}: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc. -{g|Encyclopedia:ThermalDamage}Thermal{/g}: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} elemental suele provenir de las sustancias químicas, el fuego, la electricidad y los rayos de energía. Tiene los siguientes tipos:
-<indent=5%>Fuego: todo lo que haga arder al objetivo.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Conmoción: todo lo que electrocute al objetivo.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tóxico: todo lo que inflija daño con veneno, ácido corrosivo, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Térmico: todo lo que use rayos de energía, plasma o desintegración.</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>

languages.text:
エネルギー{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は通常、様々な化学物質、火、電気、エネルギービームによって与えられる。その種類は：
－<indent=5%>火：ターゲットを発火させるもの。</indent>
－<indent=5%>ショック：ターゲットを感電させるもの。</indent>
－<indent=5%>毒物：毒や腐食性の酸などでダメージを与えるもの。</indent>
－<indent=5%>熱：エネルギービーム、プラズマを使用するなどターゲットを崩壊させるもの。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Energy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by various chemical substances, fire, electricity and energy beams. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Fire: anything that ignites the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Shock: anything that electrocutes the target.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toxic: anything that deals damage with poison, corrosive acid, etc.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Thermal: anything that uses beams of energy, plasma, or disintegrates the target.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
エネルギーダメージ{/g}は通常、様々な化学物質、火、電気、エネルギービームによって与えられる。その種類は：
－<indent=5%>火：ターゲットを発火させるもの</indent>
－<indent=5%>ショック：ターゲットを感電させるもの</indent>
－<indent=5%>毒：毒や腐食性の酸などでダメージを与えるもの</indent>
－<indent=5%>熱：エネルギービーム、プラズマを使用するなどターゲットを弱体化させるもの</indent>

languages.text:
Enerji {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} genellikle çeşitli kimyasal maddeler, ateş, elektrik ve enerji ışınları tarafından verilir. Türleri şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>Ateş: Hedefi tutuşturan her şey bu hasara sebep olur.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Şok: Hedefe elektrik akımı veren her şey bu hasara sebep olur.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Toksik: Zehir ve aşındırıcı asit gibi maddelerle zarar veren her şey bu hasara sebep olur.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Isıl: Enerji ışınları veya plazma kullanan ya da hedefi atomlarına ayıran her şey bu hasara sebep olur.</indent>
